subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols, the Cardinals slugger who overcame persistent elbow troubles last season to rank among the league leaders in every significant offensive category, won the N.L. M.V.P. Monday.
snippet: Albert Pujols, the Cardinals slugger who overcame persistent elbow troubles last season to rank among the league leaders in every significant offensive category, won the N.L. M.V.P. Monday.
